text: Guildhall is a town in and the shire townTitle 24, Part I, Chapter 1, ยง6, Vermont Statutes. Accessed 2007-11-01. (county seat) of Essex County, Vermont, United States. The population was 262 at the 2020 census. According to a large sign in the town center, it is the only town in the world with that name. It is bordered by New Hampshire and the Connecticut River on the east side. ==References== Category:Towns in Vermont Category:County seats in Vermont
title: Guildhall, Vermont
